alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 09 at 6:45PM MST until August 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE PIPELINE FIRE EAST REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 641 PM MST, County officials report about 6 to 8 inches of water flowing through the Paintbrush neighborhood. A few inches of water have also been reported flowing over North Copeland, Brandis Way, and Wupatki Trails. Between 0.25 and 0.6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall is moving into the area from the west with additional amounts of 0.25 to 0.5 inches possible in the warned area. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pipeline Fire East. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pipeline Fire East. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wupatki Trails, Pine Mountain Estates, Locket Meadow CG, Timberline, Sugarloaf Mountain, Fernwood, Hutchison Acres, Little Elden Springs Horse Camp, Schultz Pass, Hutchinson Acres, Inner Basin Pumphouse, Sunset Crater N.M., Macann Estates, Agassiz Peak, Lockett Meadow Campground and Little Elden Spring Horse Camp. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 424 and 430. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Flash flooding is occurring or imminent downstream of the Pipeline Fire scar, including Wupatki Trails, Fernwood, Hutchinson Acres, and Macann Estates. Flood waters will impact residential roads. Stay out of flood waters!
